${ModID}:FrigidBody.NAME: Frigid Body
${ModID}:FrigidBody.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply ${ModID}:Frostbite equal to blocked damage.

${ModID}:Frostburn.NAME: Frostburn
${ModID}:Frostburn.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Burn into your discard pile.

${ModID}:FrostedEdge.NAME: Frosted Edge
${ModID}:FrostedEdge.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply ${ModID}:Frostbite, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

${ModID}:GrowingAffliction.NAME: Growing Affliction
${ModID}:GrowingAffliction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you apply a debuff, return this from the discard pile to your hand and set its cost to 1.

${ModID}:InsultToInjury.NAME: Insult to Injury
${ModID}:InsultToInjury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each unique debuff the enemy has.

${ModID}:Refrigerate.NAME: Refrigerate
${ModID}:Refrigerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite. NL If the enemy already had ${ModID}:Frostbite, they lose HP equal to it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RelentlessHail.NAME: Relentless Hail
${ModID}:RelentlessHail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Increase this card's hits by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:IceShatter.NAME: Ice Shatter
${ModID}:IceShatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever the enemy loses HP during their next turn, deal !M! damage.

${ModID}:SnowedIn.NAME: Snowed In
${ModID}:SnowedIn.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite. NL The enemy's ${ModID}:Frostbite is not halved this turn.

${ModID}:Subdue.NAME: Subdue
${ModID}:Subdue.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card played in this combat was an Attack, gain !B! additional Block.
